tasks.task: Ford Challenger tractor operator applies fertilizer to soybean fields
subtasks: Sit in the cab of a Ford Challenger tractor
Engage with the dashboard controls to navigate to soybean fields
Attach a fertilizer spreader to the tractor
Operate the fertilizer spreader to apply fertilizer
Monitor the application and make adjustments as necessary
Operate the tractor's hitch to couple a seed planting implement
Follow the rows while planting seeds at the correct depth
Adjust planting speed and depth as needed

tasks.task: Operating a combine harvester during soybean harvest
subtasks: Drive the combine harvester to the soybean field
Attach the combine harvester to the tractor or self-propelled unit
Start the combine and calibrate it for soybean harvesting
Monitor grain flow and adjust settings for optimal efficiency
Empty the grain tank periodically and drive to storage location
Sort and clean harvested soybeans as needed
